title: An Act relative to studying best practices for ensuring the safety of blind persons

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sullivan-Almeida of Abington, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 287) of Alyson M. Sullivan-Almeida for legislation to establish a special commission to study and determine best practices to ensure the safety of blind persons.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/09/2025 from 1:00 PM-5:00 PM in B-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means
